raw_answer:
Yes, there is a family history of the disease for patient 'CII-3' from family 'Family C'.

The document states on page 4, in the first paragraph which describes clinical presentations: "...and the father of patient CII-3 also developed PD (Fig. 1B, C)."
Figure 1C, the pedigree for Family C, also visually shows that individual I-1 (the father of II-3) is affected (filled square).
question: Regarding patient 'CII-3' from family 'Family C': Is there a family history of the disease?
